name: Swift Aid
text: With a quick but harmless swipe, you can aid an ally’s assault.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: As a swift action, you can attempt the aid another action, granting your ally either a +1 bonus on his next attack roll or a +1 bonus to his AC.
normal: Aid another is a standard action.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, you can use this feat to aid another as a move action.
text_zh: 通过迅捷却又无害的一击，你能够对盟友的攻击进行协助。
benefit_zh: 以迅捷动作，你能够尝试进行协助他人动作，使你的盟友的下一次攻击检定获得+1加值，或者是他的AC获得+1加值。
normal_zh: 协助他人是一个标准动作。
staminaText_zh: 只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能使用这个专长以一个移动动作援助他人。
